response.overview: A spunky little girl named Maggie B. conducts her latest and greatest science experimentâ€“ launching her own satellite. But after years of pacifying Cold War paranoia in their quiet Indiana town, local priest and town patriarch, Father Paul, has different plans. When Maggie and her friends stumble upon a legitimate nuclear threat, they take it upon themselves to create something that will save the world... even if that means breaking the rules.
response.tagline: The adventure story of one little girl as she sets out to build a satellite and save the world.
response.title: Maggie B. Launches a Satellite
